titleStmt.title: A thanksgiving-sermon for the peace preach'd at the parish-church of St. Dunstan's in the West, Dec. IId, 1697 / by William Gallaway ... ; printed at the particular request of some of the hearers.
titleStmt.author: Gallaway, William, fl. 1692-1697.

notesStmt.note: Half-title reads: Mr. Gallaway's thanksgiving-sermon for the peace.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
